Description: Business workflow automation through Generative AI.
Full Description: Neural Wave offers an automation tool for SMBs streamlining both mundane business workflow and data extraction from structured and unstructured documents - in plain language instructions using Generative AI and Large Language Models ( LLM), going beyond traditional RPA , ML or integrations. Neural Wave introduces the capability for users to talk or chat to an intelligent assistant in plain language which will generate the workflow automatically to automate mundane tasks like checking emails or extracting data from spreadsheets or documents and capturing them into a business application or connect to any systems or applications. Traditionally, these workflows were created manually by RPA developers who had to learn specific tools and techniques. Consequently, non-technical individuals, including young children, were unable to utilize these tools effectively.  The AI-powered capabilities of Neural Wave will empower anyone, regardless of their technical knowledge, to automate daily and routine tasks on their computers. Description: IPG is pioneering IoT Defined Networking thorugh its flagship product Gearbox.
Full Description: The Industrial Internet of Things (I-IoT) includes devices such as video cameras, air conditioning equipment, water treatment valves, navigation equipment and thousands of other types of sensors and actuators.  The I-IoT market is exploding, expected to touch 43% of the world economy, encompassing over 150 billion deployed devices by 2022.   It is estimated that half of all firms with technology have experienced an I-IoT security breach.   IPG’s mission is to help industries manage and operate the deployment of billions of new I-IoT devices being installed across manufacturing, building control, aerospace, transportation and energy.  IPG helps organizations create I-IoT defined networks, establish strategies and define organizational best practices.  In support of its mission, IPG created GearBox, an I-IoT computer appliance with SAAS service that Manages, Synchronizes, Orchestrates and Secures I-IoT defined networks.  GearBox supports customers with one-time scans by identifying installation gaps, risks and vulnerabilities.  GearBox also has a persistent installation option providing testing alongside firmware updates, network services and performance monitoring, all presented in easy to understand dashboards.  GearBox enables unparalleled insight and actionable remediation.
Headquarters Regions: San Francisco Bay Area, Silicon Valley, West Coast
Founders: Alan Penzotti, Blaise Pabon, Chad Zerangue, Stacey Glasgow, Steven Kiss

Description: A new security and observability tool for fast log search and live threat detections for petabyte-scale log data sets in your S3.
Full Description: Scanner is a new security and observability tool based on S3 that allows users to replace or reduce cost of tools like Splunk, Elastic and Datadog by 80-90%.  Move your high volume log sources (like AWS CloudTrail, Cloudflare, VPC flow logs, WAF, etc.) into AWS S3 and... * Remove blind spots, and keep all your logs w/ unlimited retention. * Index raw log files directly in your S3 buckets (no vendor lock-in), eliminating the need for time consuming data engineering projects. * Index them with Scanner and use our UI for fast search (10TB/sec) and threat detection. * Use our API to build your own own modern stack by combining some tools together like Cribl, Scanner, Tines, and Jira. * Query the logs directly from Splunk using a custom search command Head over to scanner.dev to sign up for our Free Plan at 1TB/month with no credit card or contract required.
Headquarters Regions: San Francisco Bay Area, West Coast, Western US

Description: Deepstash is an app that offers the daily source of inspiring, life-changing stories, and ideas.
Full Description: Our core belief: ideas are fundamental. If we evolve our biology through genes, it's what we hold in our brains that help shape our lives and improve the world around us. Ideas represent the building blocks of the modern world, informing our thinking and behavior every day. New ideas breathe fresh life into how we view the world & we depend on new ideas to improve our health, productivity or our relationships. Ideas used to be reserved for the rich and powerful who had access to knowledge. Whether the king or the priest, it was those at the top that control information. With the advent of the Internet, the pendulum has swing the other side. We have so much access to information that it becomes overwhelming. There is too much to absorb and not enough time. Not to mention the socially enabled magical devices we carry in our pockets can keep our minds constantly distracted with divisive news & silly entertainment. Deepstash is platform for finding and organizing the ideas that matter to you. We are a passionate community obsessed with finding the Aha moments in all the content we are consuming. We are condensing all our insights into ideas that we share with all the other stashes who are sharing our passion. It's what we call stashing! The Deepstash app is available on the Apple App Store, Google Play as well as on the Web.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Philadelphia Area, East Coast, Southern US

Description: free astrology chat online at www.freechatwithastrologer.com is a platform that provides individuals consult to professional astrologers
Full Description: In today's fast-paced world, people are constantly seeking ways to gain insight into their lives and the future. One popular avenue for this is astrology, which has been practiced and studied for thousands of years. The advent of the internet has made it easier for individuals to access astrological guidance, and one such platform is the free astrology chat online at www.freechatwithastrologer.com. The website offers a unique opportunity for people to connect with professional astrologers from the comfort of their own homes. This eliminates the need to physically visit an astrologer and allows for a more convenient and personalized experience. The chat feature also allows for real-time communication, making it easier for individuals to ask questions and receive immediate answers. One of the major advantages of using the free astrology chat online is the accessibility it provides. People from all over the world can access the website and connect with astrologers. This breaks down the barriers of distance and language, making it possible for anyone to seek guidance from an astrologer of their choice. Description: We help SMBs identify who their best customers are, reward them, sell more and repeat.
Full Description: Today, knowing who your customers are is one of the biggest problems facing offline businesses. Small and medium businesses with physical storefronts often struggle to identify their customers and manage their own technology stacks in order to piece together disconnected pieces of information. The process of customer identification should be transparent and simple for shoppers as one click, allowing businesses to combine all data silos into one tool that can bring together transaction information and customer data. Major point-of-sale (POS) providers are investing millions of dollars in improving their credit card processing part of the business, but there is little focus on customer identification and getting those customers to come back and shop more, increasing their average ticket value. We have taken on the difficult task of building the first platform that takes over the core customer identification experience. We connect all data from online and offline customer touchpoints into one single tool, allowing businesses to not only accurately identify their best customers, but also understand their purchase preferences and habits in order to embrace the entire customer experience and convert first-time shoppers into loyal fans, increase customer lifetime value, and drive more revenue for the business. It's simple: understand who your most valuable customers are, reward them, sell more. Repeat.

Description: Travention is a transparent, innovative booking platform to assist with travel planning and execution within the United States of America.
Full Description: Travention is a transparent, innovative booking platform to assist with travel planning and execution within the United States of America. Planning trips within the US can be nerve-wrecking and very time consuming. Travention has the solution for this problem. The booking platform of Travention follows an easy step-by-step system that can easily be navigated through and paused at any time if necessary. The platform combines all aspects of travelling in one spot. So your trip can be as extensive as you wish, Travention is able to make this possible at the best price possible. All trips are limitlessly plannable and customizable. You can invite your travel companions to join in the planning process and give them individual power to plan own little getaways within the main itinerary. In the end everyone will receive a booklet in paper or digital form listing a complete timeline of the trip with all customizations, tips and info’s along the routes. We also provide a 24/7 support team reachable via phone, web, social media and chat to support with any issues that may occur. Our Customer Care Team is trained to give you tips and advice regarding your itinerary to maximize your experience when travelling. Travention groups, organizations and couples within the United States through the sophisticated booking network bookings can be placed from anywhere to anywhere. Even though the service is tailored for above mentioned groups, travelling alone is not a problem, there are no additional costs. Travention is a service completely free of hidden costs, contract bindings and obscure services. You get exactly what you want, if it is not included in our network there is a good reason for it. Travention operates on a low price basis that can only be met with the prices found only on the websites of the individual service providers at best. We pass all the prices straight to our customers and cap the result with our service fee with a max of 250 USD.
Headquarters Regions: Southern US
Industry Groups: Internet Services, Travel and Tourism

Their clients are encouraged to partner and participate in the entire process of shopping or buying a home. Built from the largest database of neighborhood statistics available today, each report contains over 250 must-see statistics, providing revealing insights about any location. House X Reports include real estate and home values, lifestyle and demographics, crime risk, and school quality. Enter an address and a House X Neighborhood Report is returned to you. The company serves as the primary manager of American Dream 2021 Pilot Project featuring over 30,000 participating new smart homes in California, Delaware, Florida, Georgia, North Carolina, Pennsylvania, South Carolina, Tennessee, Texas and other markets. Description: Developer of the ASKA™ A5 drive & fly eVTOL - Flying Car
Full Description: Developer of the ASKA™ A5 drive-and-fly electric vehicle with Vertical Takeoff and Landing (VTOL) and Short Takeoff and Landing (STOL) capabilities. The aerodynamic 4-seater roadable aircraft is equipped with advanced AI (artificial intelligence) controls, powered by batteries and a range extender engine for a 250-mile flight range. The vehicle uses existing infrastructure for takeoff/landing/changing. It is positioned for both consumer and commercial markets, enabling people to drive, fly and then drive to the final destination in one vehicle. ASKA™ advanced to a fully functional prototype in January 2023 and is performing flight testing. Over 500 miles of road testing have been conducted around Silicon Valley. The roadable aircraft is progressing with the FAA type certification process, has Special Airworthiness Certification and authorization to drive on public roads from the Department of Motor Vehicles (DMV). The company is working towards the G1 basis of Type Certification and has a Space Act agreement with NASA. The company announced $50 million in pre-orders for ASKA™ A5 and projects commercialization in 2026, subject to certification.  ASKA was founded in 2018 by Maki and Guy Kaplinsky, experienced technology entrepreneurs. Their previous startup, IQP Corporation, was acquired by GE in 2017.

Industries: Business Process Automation (BPA), Marketing Automation, Sales Automation
Description: DoFlo offers a new way of workflow automation which is powered by asynchronous event streaming technology and AI.
Full Description: doFlo is a new way of doing workflow automation. Market leaders, despite their dominance, are now experiencing unprecedented churn and this is because they’ve failed to meet the evolving expectations of their user base. As long term automation users ourselves, we've faced the same issues; high-friction setups, temperamental workflows, and being limited to simple, partial processes. Essentially, it boils down to; usability, reliability, and scalability. The proof is in the data. According to PWC, 69% of automation initiatives fail to execute due to complexity, and of those that do, another 50% then fail later on due to reliability and scalability issues. Clearly there’s an industry-wide problem here. doFlo, powered by asynchronous event streaming technology and AI, addresses these gaps and is so compelling that we’re seeing, not churned, but existing automation users move to doFlo. So what does it look like? Our workflow editor is drag and drop, it’s no code and uses simple annotations in English to create automations for you. It’s easy, if you can plot a flow chart, you can make sophisticated workflows that never fail, in minutes. We plan to maneuver from SMB to mid-market and enterprise, but first we must segment. Our ICP is the unaddressed real estate market, sold via self-service for bottom-up scaling. After monopolizing this, we'll then expand horizontally into more competitive markets. Our competitors serve basic process needs for SMB customers quite well, but their mid-market and enterprise customers seek more scalable and sophisticated workflows. doFlo’s limitless scalability means we meet these expectations perfectly. Our business model is simple. It’s to offer a superior, affordable product for our customers with higher margins for us and our pricing model scales on automation connections and storage capacity. This isn’t the first time I’ve done this. In fact, the doFlo founders have seen repeated success. Across our 12 years together, we’ve founded a number of successful companies, which includes a notable exit to Avast in 2018. doFlo is making good progress so far. We recently hit $5K MRR from our paid pilot program that we opened in December, have 100 accounts on our waiting list, and plan for GA in March 2024.
Headquarters Regions: Washington DC Metro Area, East Coast, Southern US
Industry Groups: Information Technology, Sales and Marketing, Software

Description: Our mission is to help individuals and families navigate the complex and often confusing process of immigrating to the United States.
Full Description: Welcome to USCIS News, your go-to source for information and updates on the US immigration system. Our mission is to help individuals and families navigate the complex and often confusing process of immigrating to the United States. We understand that the US immigration system can be overwhelming, with numerous legal and procedural requirements that can vary based on each person's unique circumstances. That's why we've created this website as a resource to provide accurate and up-to-date information on the latest news and changes in US immigration policy. Our team of experts is dedicated to providing valuable insights and guidance on topics such as visas, green cards, citizenship, naturalization, and more. We also provide helpful tips and advice on navigating the US immigration system, including the application process, interview preparation, and working with immigration officials. At USCIS News, we believe that everyone deserves the opportunity to pursue their dreams and build a better life for themselves and their families in the United States. We're here to help you every step of the way on your journey to becoming a US immigrant. Thank you for visiting USCIS News, and we look forward to being your trusted resource for all things related to US immigration.

Zammo.ai enables you to create a ChatGPT-like experience using your web pages, knowledge base articles and document repositories. The experience can be made accessible across voice, text, Telephony/IVR and social channels and in multiple languages. The Zammo application resides securely on your Azure tenant. 		 With Zammo’s user-friendly, affordable, and cross-platform solution, enterprises of all sizes can have a branded presence on voice, and deploy conversational communications in a surprisingly short amount of time with little or no professional IT help.		 		 Conversational AI opens up a whole new world for people with disabilities. We are passionate about our platform that makes interacting with enterprises possible for people that have traditionally been limited to a select few accessibility-compliant companies. Enterprise accessibility goals are easily achieved with Zammo. We provide the ability to reach new potential customers and interact with them in a natural and intuitive way.	 		 As a remote team, we understand what it takes to collaborate and communicate to drive our product enhancements and market awareness. We are passionate creatives who constantly learn and improve together while celebrating the success of the enterprises with Zammo powering their customer engagements

Apps and websites from various industries can benefit from Storyly Stories to; - Activate new users with a flawless onboarding flow - Actively engage with your users through a full-screen and familiar content experience - Drive retention through personalized experiences  - Grow app stickiness by creating a habit with gamified Stories - Publish in-app video content - Gather zero-party data for building contextual audiences through interactive stickers - Deliver the relevant messages to the right people with advanced segmentation and targeting - Drive greater sales conversions with shoppable Stories - Repurpose your existing content with social media import - Grow app/website revenue by monetizing your Stories Headquartered in New York, USA, Storyly has offices in San Diego, Stuttgart, London, Amsterdam, Zurich, Tel Aviv, Bangkok, São Paulo, Buenos Aires, İstanbul, and Ankara.

Description: We believe that value-aligned entrepreneurship positively impacts lives and delivers returns.
Full Description: The Pay It Forward Company was founded with a mission to enable the dreamers, the builders, the change makers - breathing life to critical innovations that bring forth immense impact and financial upside. We pair a technology enabled approach with a flexible mandate and support the full stack, from an idea on the back of a napkin to going public, and the journey in between. We source thesis-aligned investments, incubate companies, facilitate capital formation, recruit talent and get our hands dirty working with founders and business leaders to drive outcomes. We are masters at enabling synergistic relationships between founders, funds, institutions and family offices. Through activating networks of uniquely qualified partners to maximize the probability of success for the products we bring to market. We build and invest in companies that move the ball forward. And when we're right, earn many multiples on investment. We distribute 80% of profits to the partners that make the magic happen, and donate 20% of the profits to outcome-driven nonprofits. We work with family offices, private and public enterprises, institutions and other deep pockets of capital launch and implement holistic and diversified investment strategies across asset classes. We provide end to end back office support across Operations, Finance, Accounting and Legal services. We’ve supported the growth stories of successful venture capital franchises like Deciens Capital and Tribe Capital. We carefully select and prioritize strengthening one franchise at a time.  We believe that life is truly lived when working on problems limiting humanity to extend human capacity. That playing the long game is a lost art, and we are patient capital in search of the most meaningful outcomes. We believe in the power of great karma—the idea that when you build things that matter and treat people with integrity and kindness, you not only make the world better for others; you also make it better for yourself.

We believe by making professional CPA services free and accessible to all business owners we can significantly boost entrepreneurship and spark innovation. This is our first step in furthering our mission - To empower business owners to respond to their entrepreneurial callings, drive the frontiers of their potential, and realize the American Dream. We believe in creating a world where every individual with an entrepreneurial spirit can realize their destinies without any and all barriers. We are and always will be resolute in our pursuit to eliminate any and all barriers for business owners around the world. Currently, business owners are hassled with monotonous compliance tasks, complicated regulatory filings and expensive fees. At EFORTles, we believe running a business should be fun, exciting and inspiring. Hence, we aspire to remove all these barriers and provide them with the essential support to continue doing what they love, what they are passionate about and where their talent lies.

Description: Game development AI platform
Full Description: Ludo is the game developers' toolkit for inspiration: from game art to up-to-the-minute research on leading games in their genres, Ludo offers game developers and creators a wide variety of cutting-edge AI tools to support and aid them on their game development journey. Ludo’s research toolkit offers developers a simple all-in-one platform to efficiently conduct research during the game creation process. Developers can use Ludo to discover the most popular games across major marketplaces including the App Store and Google Play with its Top Charts features. Daily Trends help users to see what topics, themes and ideas are trending across the world, giving key insight into what players are finding themselves drawn to. As well as this, its Icon and Image Search offers a growing database of over two million assets for developers to take inspiration for their next hit game. Once the research phase is completed, Ludo’s pioneering Ideation tools support developers in creating fresh, exciting new concepts for their games. Ludo’s Game Ideator generates entire concepts for games from simple keywords. The Game Elements feature generates specialised aspects of a game, including narrative, enemies and quest ideas. A first-of-its-kind game focused Image Generator is also available to users in Beta, to give inspiration for artwork, iconography and more!  Ludo is a game developer’s best friend and is here to support and assist developers through the process of creating their next smash-hit game!

Industries: E-Commerce, Marketing, Social Impact, Software, Sustainability, Travel
Description: Sustainable Travel Marketplace
Full Description: Travaras is an online travel platform for booking sustainable accommodations and activities. The platform sells accommodations and activities that are certified sustainable by third party agencies such as LEED-EBOM (Leadership in Energy and Environmental Design), B-Corp, and regional sustainability certification agencies such as Sustainable Tourism Association of Hawaii. By vetting and aggregating sustainable travel operators onto a unified platform, Travaras aims to minimize the environmental impacts of travel, support the local community, and preserve cultural heritage.  Travaras is an online marketplace business model and acts as an intermediary between sustainable travel providers and customers. Travaras does not own or operate the travel accommodations or activities listed on their platform. The service is free for customers, and the provider of the travel accommodation or activity pays Travaras a percentage of its booking revenue.  Jennifer Loh, CEO & Co-Founder, and Samreen Asad, CTO & Co-Founder, founded Travaras on July 21, 2023.
Headquarters Regions: San Francisco Bay Area, Silicon Valley, West Coast
Industry Groups: Commerce and Shopping, Other, Sales and Marketing, Social Impact, Software, Sustainability, Travel and Tourism

Industries: Cloud Storage, Internet, Privacy, Private Cloud, Security, Software
Description: End-to-end encrypted storage and sharing for Photos
Full Description: Ente is a simple app to backup and share your photos and videos. If you've been looking for a privacy-friendly alternative to Google Photos, this is it. With Ente, they are stored end-to-end encrypted (e2ee). This means that only you can view them. Ente offers apps across Android, iOS, web and desktop, and your photos will seamlessly sync between all of them in an end-to-end encrypted (e2ee) manner. Ente also makes it simple to share your albums with your loved ones, even if they aren't on Ente. You can share publicly viewable links, where they can view your album and collaborate by adding photos to it, even without an account or app. Your encrypted data is replicated to 3 different locations, including a fall-out shelter in Paris. We take posterity seriously and make it easy to ensure that your memories outlive you. We are here to make the safest photos app ever, come join our journey!
Headquarters Regions: East Coast, Southern US

Gone are the days of waiting in a terrible room while your oil gets changed, or your car gets cleaned. We take the anxiety out of searching for a car service tech by bringing reputable Joe’s directly to your  home or office. Through our website you are able to schedule a number of automotive services including car wash, oil change, and Paintless Dent Repair (PDR); with more to come in the near future. With CarJoe the price you see is the price you’ll pay. There are never any hidden fee’s or tactics meant to get your attention. Our goal is to be as transparent as possible with both our customers and technicians as well as deliver top-notch customer service. 99.9% satisfaction guaranteed. There’s always room for improvement (based on your feedback)!
Headquarters Regions: Greater Miami Area, East Coast, Southern US

Description: We provide subscription-based security teams to lead the charge on security, compliance and/or data privacy at high-growth startups.
Full Description: Eden Data is a cybersecurity consulting firm founded by former 'Big 4' leaders that were inspired by the way emerging startups were transforming their industries and wanted to do the same. We took a modern approach to our business model, offering no contract, subscription based services designed in three tiers to meet the needs of any size organization. In doing so, we eliminated the traditional consulting approach of a service-based model that acts as a pricey barrier to entry. Our core belief is that startups should have a security program that can match their disruption and ingenuity- therefore we build cloud centric security programs with a focus on automation to provide the agility and scalability necessary for a startup's success now and in the future.  1. World class cyber security leadership should not be exclusively available to large enterprises. 2. Startups should have a security program that can match their disruption and ingenuity.  3. Startups are our focus, not our pipeline fillers.
Headquarters Regions: Southern US
Industry Groups: Information Technology, Privacy and Security, Professional Services

Description: Detecting the world's #1 killer earlier with artificial intelligence and widely available, low cost, safer imaging technology.
Full Description: The vast majority of chronic diseases show no symptoms until it's too late. We're solving these problems with artificial intelligence and existing diagnostic modalities common within clinics, imaging centers, and hospitals. Our goal is to detect common chronic disease risks at a fraction of the cost and risk to patients. By integrating with established technologies already relied upon in healthcare today, we're making it simple, safe, and affordable to detect disease risk earlier for everyone.

Description: Tectum is the world's fastest blockchain - a lightning-fast distributed ledger protocol blockchain platform.
Full Description: Tectum™ is a distributed ledger protocol managing platform that employs the proprietary record change signature management algorithm – HashDrive™. Our technology provides instant event status delivery and event ownership updates throughout the whole network along with distributed levels of access to functional system modules without cluttering the bandwidth between the nodes. Instead of storing the data directly in the blockchain, Tectum stores hashes that are mapped back to the original data stored at a lower level. This isolates the heavy transaction-related data from the main pipeline by hashing, encrypting and signing the bundles at the end of every transaction and archiving it. This makes the event-related data instantly verifiable and publicly accessible, with different levels of accessibility provided to different transaction-related modules. The event hashing process is run on top of a database in order to enable faster retrieval of data items, and works as an upper functional layer to keep the main-net pipeline free from heavy data processing. The mechanism of isolating the system event formalization process from big-data leading to the main-net unprecedented throughput capabilities is our value proposition. Normally, the rule of thumb for a blockchain is that the greater the security, the slower it is. Conversely, if you want a fast blockchain, you’re going to have security issues, because everything comes with a cost. That’s not the case for Tectum, however, because we’ve separated the levels of data into multiple tiers.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Chicago Area, Great Lakes, Midwestern US
Industry Groups: Blockchain and Cryptocurrency, Financial Services, Information Technology, Other, Software

Full Description: Our software removes the needed expertise on how to design and implement effective training, so that anyone, expert or not, can create distance learning that is beautiful, memorable, and effective.  We have no direct competitors, and we can capture every industry. The training industry was worth $87B in 2019. The education industry was worth $142B in 2018.  Yet high quality, remote learning requires three (expensive) things: a subject matter expert,  a training expert, and a solid and versatile platform.   The majority of the corporations and education organizations in the world are missing at least one of these three. This results in: boring and ineffective products, poor performance and results, inability to link training outcomes to business outcomes (e.g., ROI). Our software can be successfully marketed and applicable to every industry.

Full Description: Paprika - pepper has deep meaning in almost every culture. Paprika’s are prolific growers, often taking root from a single fallen seed. Description: United Nations is an international organization founded after the Second World War to maintain international peace and security.
Full Description: The United Nations is an international organization founded in 1945 after the Second World War by 51 countries committed to maintaining international peace and security, developing friendly relations among nations and promoting social progress, better living standards and human rights. Due to its unique international character, and the powers vested in its founding Charter, the Organization can take action on a wide range of issues, and provide a forum for its 192 Member States to express their views, through the General Assembly, the Security Council, the Economic and Social Council and other bodies and committees. The work of the United Nations reaches every corner of the globe. Although best known for peacekeeping, peacebuilding, conflict prevention and humanitarian assistance, there are many other ways the United Nations and its System (specialized agencies, funds and programmes) affect our lives and make the world a better place. The Organization works on a broad range of fundamental issues, from sustainable development, environment and refugees protection, disaster relief, counter terrorism, disarmament and non-proliferation, to promoting democracy, human rights, gender equality and the advancement of women, governance, economic and social development and international health, clearing landmines, expanding food production, and more, in order to achieve its goals and coordinate efforts for a safer world for this and future generations.
Headquarters Regions: Greater New York Area, East Coast, Northeastern US
Industry Groups: Community and Lifestyle, Other, Social Impact

Description: Official provides a social media app for couples to help them maintain and improve their relationships.
Full Description: For many people, once they start dating their partner they don’t put in the same amount of effort as they did initially. Once a couple succumbs to complacency the relationship has a tendency to stall, we want to help people avoid this phenomenon.  In today’s modern world of technology, there are a plethora of applications which allow for an individual to seek companionship, yet there is nothing that helps them be a better partner and enhance their relationship or bond with their partner. Official is a new kind of application that allows users to easily engage more with their partner and rewards them for doing things they should be doing naturally.  Official looks to fill the void that remains once the initial relationship is formed by building upon the foundation of a primary relationship, and looks to provide the greatest chance for a lasting and healthy relationship between users. By allowing users to remember important details, no matter how big or small, and create memories that will last a lifetime, Official exists as the perfect addition for any relationship. Our goal is not to help you find someone, but to make sure that you keep the person you are already with. We believe the best way to sustain a healthy relationship, is to #GetOfficial.

Industries: Advertising, Android, App Discovery, App Marketing, Apps, iOS, Mobile Apps, Mobile Devices, Social Media
Description: WhoYou is the first pull-oriented connection application.
Full Description: WhoYou is the first pull-oriented connection application. They users of social media have no choice but to have their online experience dictated to them by other users & businesses as they push their opinions, politics, humor, ads, and more out to the world with little regard for the psychological effect that content and privacy-abusing advertising can have on people and society as a whole. It’s for these reasons that over half of all Americans agree that social media is a negative influence on the world. Businesses’ (especially SMBs) only way of knowing when and why people are interested in their products is reactively, once they have been exposed to their advertising. These companies are losing out on a completely untapped area of business-to-customer communication where, preemptively, companies are able to generate revenue from customers who have never interacted with their advertising in any way.  Solution: WhoYou allows users to have complete control over their social media experience because, for the user, YOU are the master of the content that you see, hear, and feel. You are able to pull out the information from other users that you’re interested in, freeing you from the incessant negativity that is now available. For businesses, user’s cynical insinuations caused by your advertising will disappear, as you will be able to communicate in a real, unobtrusive human manner with those people most interested in the products and services that you provide, in a completely preemptive manner. This is a completely new way to connect and it’s not just exciting because it’s different, it’s exciting because it’s better.bio, pictures, other searches). The original user can take a look and then send them a message. The receiver can preview the message before they accept it. If they do accept the message, a conversation can begin.

Industries: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Machine Learning, SaaS, Scheduling, Software
Description: Sidekick Ai offers multiple ways to schedule meetings including; forward to schedule, link sharing and sidekick scheduling.
Full Description: Think of Sidekick Ai as your smart scheduling assistant. Our platform offers multiple ways to schedule meetings including; forward to schedule, link sharing and sidekick scheduling. We are the first scheduling software that uses machine learning to process language to schedule a meeting.  Forward to Schedule: When you receive an email, simply forward this email to your Sidekick. Sidekick will then read the email and try to find requested dates and time from the sender and match it with your schedule. If it missing information, it will reply back to the sender and coordinate the meeting for you.  Link Sharing: This is pretty standard in today's scheduling softwares. Simply share your scheduling link with someone and they will chat with your Sidekick to schedule the meeting with you.  Sidekick Scheduling:  Here is where more magic happens. Simply request that Sidekick schedule a meeting for you and it's done. Tell Sidekick who you want to meet with and when. From there, Sidekick will email the invitees and find times that work for everyone and get something scheduled for everyone. You don't have to worry about coordinating, following up or finding times... that is what Sidekick is for.  Sidekick also offers auto scheduling with your closest of contacts. We allow users to turn on auto scheduling for close contacts and when you want to schedule a meeting, it's instantly done and will be added to everyone's calendars.
Headquarters Regions: Great Lakes, Midwestern US
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Information Technology, Science and Engineering, Software
